mapper.insert: insert into lms_playlist (playlistName, description, tag, instructorID, exposed, seq) values (#{playlistName}, #{description}, #{tag}, #{instructorID}, #{exposed}, #{seq})
mapper.update: update lms_playlist set seq=#{seq} where id=#{playlistID}
mapper.select: select * from lms_playlist where exposed=1 order by seq desc
mapper.update: update lms_playlist set totalVideo = ( select count(*) from lms_video where playlistID=#{playlistID} ) where id=#{playlistID}
update lms_playlist set totalVideoLength = ( select sum(duration) from lms_video where playlistID=#{playlistID} ) where id=#{playlistID}
mapper.select: select * from lms_playlist join lms_video on lms_playlist.id = lms_video.playlistID where lms_playlist.id=#{id}
